2021-06-24

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-15,‡§µ‡•É‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§ï‡§É-‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§æüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-03-10üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-04ü™êüåû‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-03, Islamic: 1442-11-14 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§™‡•å‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∏‡•Ä‚ñ∫24:09*; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§•‡§Æ‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§æ‚ñ∫09:09; ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§≤‡§æ‚ñ∫ (‡§ß‡§®‡•Å‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§∂‡•Å‡§≠‡§É‚ñ∫06:02; ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§≤‡§É‚ñ∫26:12*; ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫13:50; ‡§¨‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫24:09*; ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§µ‡•É‡§∑‡§≠‡§É
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (139.99¬∞ ‚Üí 141.00¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (16.56¬∞ ‚Üí 17.39¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (120.57¬∞ ‚Üí 121.53¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-34.95¬∞ ‚Üí -34.61¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-23.42¬∞ ‚Üí -23.68¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:48-12:11üåûÔ∏è-18:34üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî18:19; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî—
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:48-07:23; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî08:59-10:35; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:11-13:47; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:22-16:58; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:34-19:58
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:48-06:39; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:39-07:30; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:12-10:03; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:45-12:36; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:19-15:10; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:52-17:43; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:43-18:34
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:18-05:03; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:04-01:18
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî13:47-15:22; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî05:48-07:23; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî08:59-10:35
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫14:19); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§§‡•à‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§æ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ-‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§é‡§∞‡•Å‡§µ‡§ï-‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ, ‡§ï‡§¨‡•Ä‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§∏-‡§ú‡§Ø‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä, ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§æ‡§≠‡§ø‡§∑‡•á‡§ï‡§É, ‡§™‡§û‡•ç‡§ö-‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ-‡§™‡•Ç‡§ú‡§æ (‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ), ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§£‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ-‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§Æ‡§®‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§ø‡§É-(‡§≠‡•å‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§É-[‡•ß‡•™]), ‡§µ‡§ü-‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ/‡§µ‡§ü-‡§∏‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä-‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§µ‡•á‡§ô‡•ç‡§ï‡§ü‡§æ‡§ö‡§≤‡•á ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§†-‡§Ö‡§≠‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§Ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§≠‡§ø‡§∑‡•á‡§ï‡§É (‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£-‡§ï‡§µ‡§ö‡§Æ‡•ç), ‡§µ‡•á‡§ô‡•ç‡§ï‡§ü‡§æ‡§ö‡§≤‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ-‡§ó‡§∞‡•Å‡§°-‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ
‡§Ö‡§≤‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§æ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ-‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç

Observed on Paur·πáamƒÅsƒ´ tithi of Jyai·π£·π≠ha·∏• (lunar) month (S≈´ryodaya·∏•/puurvaviddha). Padmavati Devi is taken out on the plava (last three days).

‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§£‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ç

pƒÅrva·πáavratam on the eve of p≈´r·πáa-sthƒÅlƒ´pƒÅka·∏•.

‡§ó‡•É‡§π‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç

‡§™‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§É, ‡§™‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§¶‡§Ø‡•ã ‡§Ω‡§≠‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§É‡•§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§û‡•ç‡§ö - ‘‡§Ö‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£ ‡§è‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡•Å‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•å‡§™‡§µ‡§∏‡§•‡§ø‡§ï‡§Ç ‡§¶‡§Æ‡•ç‡§™‡§§‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Å‡§û‡•ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§¶‡•ç ‡§è‡§®‡§Ø‡•ã‡§É ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç- ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§∂‡§≤‡•á‡§®’‡•§

‘‡§Ö‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡•§ ‡§∏‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§¶‡§ø‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡•§ ‡§Ö‡§ß ‡§è‡§µ‡•à‡§§‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§Ø‡•Ä‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ç‡•§ ‡§§‡•å ‡§ñ‡§≤‡•Å ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§®‡•ç-‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§µ‡•ç ‡§è‡§µ‡•à‡§§‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§π‡§∞‡•á‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ç ‡§á‡§§‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∏-‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§£ ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á‡§®‡§ö‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡•§ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§ó‡•Å‡§™‡•ç‡§∏‡•á‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡•ç ‡§è‡§µ‡§æ‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§É ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§É‡•§’

‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§∞‡§£‡§æ‡§¶‡§Ø‡•ã ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§É ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§É‡•§

‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§Æ‡•ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§ø ‡§ï‡§ø‡§û‡•ç‡§ö‡§®‡•ç ‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç

“‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§£‡§ø ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§§‡§ø‡§≤‡§≠‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§â‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡•ã‡§≠‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§â‡§¶‡§ï‡§Æ‡•Å‡§™‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡•É‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡§∂‡§É ‡§∏‡§π‡§∏‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Ø‡•á‡§¶‡•ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡§∂‡•ã ‡§µ‡§æ” ‡§á‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ç ‡§Ü‡§™‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§ß‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•Å‡•§

‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ-‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç

Observed on Paur·πáamƒÅsƒ´ tithi of every (lunar) month (S≈´ryodaya·∏•/puurvaviddha). p≈´r·πáimƒÅ vratam is commonly observed for Lord Satyanarayana.

Observed on Paur·πáamƒÅsƒ´ tithi of every (lunar) month (Chandrodaya·∏•/puurvaviddha). Lord Malayappa rides on Garuda Vahanam in all four mada streets. This usually happens during Brahmotsavams, but since 2006, this has been happening on every p≈´r·πáimƒÅ.

‡§µ‡§ü-‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ/‡§µ‡§ü-‡§∏‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä-‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç

2021-06-25

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-16,‡§ß‡§®‡•Å‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§≤‡§æüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-03-11üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-05ü™êüåû‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-04, Islamic: 1442-11-15 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§•‡§Æ‡§æ‚ñ∫20:59; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§≤‡§æ‚ñ∫06:38; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∑‡§æ‡§¢‡§æ‚ñ∫28:23*; ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡§æ‡§¢‡§æ‚ñ∫ (‡§ß‡§®‡•Å‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‚ñ∫22:34; ‡§á‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫10:32; ‡§ï‡•å‡§≤‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫20:59; ‡§§‡•à‡§§‡§ø‡§≤‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§µ‡•É‡§∑‡§≠‡§É
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (141.00¬∞ ‚Üí 142.00¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (17.39¬∞ ‚Üí 18.14¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-34.61¬∞ ‚Üí -34.28¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (121.53¬∞ ‚Üí 122.50¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-23.68¬∞ ‚Üí -23.94¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:48-12:11üåûÔ∏è-18:34üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî06:03; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî19:21
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:48-07:24; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:00-10:35; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:11-13:47; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:23-16:58; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:34-19:58
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:48-06:39; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:39-07:30; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:12-10:03; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:46-12:37; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:19-15:10; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:52-17:43; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:43-18:34
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:18-05:03; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:04-01:19
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî10:35-12:11; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî15:23-16:58; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî07:24-09:00
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫10:54); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§ó‡•Å‡§°‡§Æ‡•ç

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§™‡•Å‡§∞-‡§ú‡§Ø‡§É #‡•ß‡•¨‡•™, ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§£-‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§µ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∂‡§É ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡•á, ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∏‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§É, ‡§Æ‡§£‡§ø-‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ-‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç #‡•®‡•Æ‡•©, ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§™‡§æ‡§ï‡§É
‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§™‡•Å‡§∞-‡§ú‡§Ø‡§É #‡•ß‡•¨‡•™

Event occured on 1857-06-25 (gregorian). As the British forces at kAnpur surrendered on 25 June 1857, Nana was declared Peshwa in late June.

On June 27, the british making their way on gangA at Satichaura Ghat were killed or captured (it’s unclear who fired teh first shot). Around 120 women and children were taken prisoner and eventually moved to Bibighar; later more were added.

Using them for bargaining failed - and eventually, they were massacred on July 15 despite protestations (including hunger strike) of nAnA-saheb’s family, and hesitency / refusal of the soldiers - partly in anger at reports of violence by British against villagers. Finally, owner of the place, begum hussaini khAnum, a harlot, hired butchers to finish them off with cleavers. The British extracted their terrible vengence later.

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags:
‡§Æ‡§£‡§ø-‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ-‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç #‡•®‡•Æ‡•©

Event occured on 1738-06-25 (gregorian). Julian date was converted to Gregorian in this reckoning. maNi-rAm, aka bhAi maNi singh, a fine scholar and warrior, shiShya of the last 4 sikh gurus + bandA vairAgI, aged 94, was dismembered limb by limb.

Reason: Governor of Lahore, Zakaria Khan, expected Rs 5k in return for permission to celebrate divAlI at harmandir. But, knowing that he intended a slaughter (in collusion with divAn lakhpat rAi), the sikhs did not turn up - so maNi could not pay the money.

Details

  • Tags:
‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§£-‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§µ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∂‡§É ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡•á

Observed on K·πõ·π£·πáa-PrathamƒÅ tithi of every (lunar) month (P≈´rvƒÅh·πáa·∏•/puurvaviddha). ‘‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§£‡§ø ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§§‡§ø‡§≤‡§≠‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§â‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡•ã‡§≠‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§â‡§¶‡§ï‡§Æ‡•Å‡§™‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡•É‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡§∂‡§É ‡§∏‡§π‡§∏‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Ø‡•á‡§¶‡•ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡§∂‡•ã ‡§µ‡§æ ' ‡§á‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ç ‡§Ü‡§™‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§ß‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•Å‡•§

‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∏‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§É

Observed on K·πõ·π£·πáa-PrathamƒÅ tithi of every (lunar) month (P≈´rvƒÅh·πáa·∏•/puurvaviddha).

‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§™‡§æ‡§ï‡§É

Observed on K·πõ·π£·πáa-PrathamƒÅ tithi of every (lunar) month (P≈´rvƒÅh·πáa·∏•/puurvaviddha). sthƒÅlƒ´paka·∏• is an important fortnightly ritual, involving the offering of havi·π£yƒÅnna to agni, with the offering being cooked on the fire itself.

2021-06-26

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-17,‡§ß‡§®‡•Å‡§É-‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡§æ‡§¢‡§æüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-03-12üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-06ü™êüåû‡§∂‡§®‡§ø‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-05, Islamic: 1442-11-16 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø‡§æ‚ñ∫18:11; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§§‡•É‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡§æ‡§¢‡§æ‚ñ∫26:34*; ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§£‡§É‚ñ∫ (‡§Æ‡§ï‡§∞‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§á‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§É‚ñ∫19:15; ‡§µ‡•à‡§ß‡•É‡§§‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§§‡•à‡§§‡§ø‡§≤‡§É‚ñ∫07:32; ‡§ó‡§∞‡§É‚ñ∫18:11; ‡§µ‡§£‡§ø‡§ú‡§É‚ñ∫28:58*; ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (142.00¬∞ ‚Üí 143.00¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-23.94¬∞ ‚Üí -24.20¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (122.50¬∞ ‚Üí 123.47¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (18.14¬∞ ‚Üí 18.81¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-34.28¬∞ ‚Üí -33.95¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:48-12:11üåûÔ∏è-18:34üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî07:07; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî20:19
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:48-07:24; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:00-10:36; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:11-13:47; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:23-16:59; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:34-19:59
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:48-06:39; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:39-07:30; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:13-10:04; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:46-12:37; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:19-15:10; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:52-17:43; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:43-18:34
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:18-05:03; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:04-01:19
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî09:00-10:36; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî13:47-15:23; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî05:48-07:24
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫09:13); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§¶‡§ß‡§ø

2021-06-27

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-18,‡§Æ‡§ï‡§∞‡§É-‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§£‡§Éüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-03-13üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-07ü™êüåû‡§≠‡§æ‡§®‡•Å‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-06, Islamic: 1442-11-17 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§§‡•É‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø‡§æ‚ñ∫15:54; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§ö‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡•Ä‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§£‡§É‚ñ∫25:20*; ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§æ‚ñ∫ (‡§Æ‡§ï‡§∞‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§µ‡•à‡§ß‡•É‡§§‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫16:22; ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ï‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫15:54; ‡§¨‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫27:00*; ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (143.00¬∞ ‚Üí 144.01¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (18.81¬∞ ‚Üí 19.40¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (123.47¬∞ ‚Üí 124.45¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-24.20¬∞ ‚Üí -24.46¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-33.95¬∞ ‚Üí -33.61¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:48-12:11üåûÔ∏è-18:35üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî08:08; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî21:10
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:48-07:24; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:00-10:36; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:11-13:47; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:23-16:59; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:35-19:59
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:48-06:40; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:40-07:31; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:13-10:04; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:46-12:37; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:19-15:10; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:52-17:43; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:43-18:35
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:19-05:03; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:04-01:19
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî16:59-18:35; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî12:11-13:47; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî15:23-16:59
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫10:55); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§ó‡•Å‡§°‡§Æ‡•ç

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£‡§™‡§ø‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤-‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§ó‡§£‡§™‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ï‡§ü‡§π‡§∞-‡§ö‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡•Ä-‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§µ‡•à‡§ß‡•É‡§§‡§ø-‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§£-‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç
‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£‡§™‡§ø‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤-‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§ó‡§£‡§™‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ï‡§ü‡§π‡§∞-‡§ö‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡•Ä-‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç

Special vrata day for Ganesha. In this month, Ganesha is worshipped as k·πõ·π£·πáapi·πÖgala-mahƒÅga·πáapati·∏•. Fast during the day and pray to Ganesha after moonrise, as follows:

‡§ó‡§£‡§æ‡§ß‡§ø‡§™‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•á‡§µ‡•á‡§∂ ‡§ö‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§ú‡§ø‡§§‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§
‡§ï‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§ö‡§Ø‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§® ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Ç ‡§ö ‡§¶‡•á‡§π‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡••

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags: MonthlyVratam SankataharaChaturthiVratam
‡§µ‡•à‡§ß‡•É‡§§‡§ø-‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§Æ‡•ç

Observed on Vaidh·πõti·∏• yoga of every (sidereal solar) month (AparƒÅh·πáa·∏•/vyaapti). Vaidhrti Shraddha day.

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags: MonthlyShraddhaDays ShannavatiTarpanaDays
‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§£-‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç

Observed on ≈örava·πáa·∏• nakshatra of every (sidereal solar) month (SƒÅ·πÖgava·∏•/puurvaviddha).

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags: SpecialVratam

2021-06-28

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-19,‡§Æ‡§ï‡§∞‡§É-‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§æüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-03-14üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-08ü™êüåû‡§∏‡•ã‡§Æ‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-07, Islamic: 1442-11-18 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§ö‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡•Ä‚ñ∫14:16; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§™‡§û‡•ç‡§ö‡§Æ‡•Ä‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§æ‚ñ∫24:46*; ‡§∂‡§§‡§≠‡§ø‡§∑‡§ï‡•ç‚ñ∫ (‡§ï‡•Å‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ï‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§É‚ñ∫14:01; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫14:16; ‡§ï‡•å‡§≤‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫25:44*; ‡§§‡•à‡§§‡§ø‡§≤‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡§ü‡§É
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (144.01¬∞ ‚Üí 145.01¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-33.61¬∞ ‚Üí -33.28¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (124.45¬∞ ‚Üí 125.43¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-24.46¬∞ ‚Üí -24.72¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (19.40¬∞ ‚Üí 19.91¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:49-12:12üåûÔ∏è-18:35üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî09:06; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî21:57
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:49-07:24; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:00-10:36; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:12-13:47; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:23-16:59; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:35-19:59
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:49-06:40; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:40-07:31; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:13-10:04; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:46-12:37; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:19-15:10; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:53-17:44; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:44-18:35
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:19-05:04; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:04-01:19
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî07:24-09:00; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî10:36-12:12; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî13:47-15:23
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫09:13); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§¶‡§ß‡§ø

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§π‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä‡§ò‡§æ‡§ü‡•Ä-‡§Ø‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§Æ‡•ç #‡•™‡•™‡•´
‡§π‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä‡§ò‡§æ‡§ü‡•Ä-‡§Ø‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§Æ‡•ç #‡•™‡•™‡•´

Event occured on 1576-06-28 (gregorian). Julian date was converted to Gregorian in this reckoning. On this day, pratApasiMha and his subjects (from all varNa-s including v1 and v3 to bhils) fought mogols at haldIghATI.

The mogol side was led by the traitorous Kacchavaha general of Akbar, Man Singh. They outnumbered pratAp’s side 5:1; and were filled with professional soldiers. (Prof K S Gupta: Most Rajput treaties [eg. 1569 Bundi-Mughal treaty] with Akbar had a clause that they would not be asked to join arms against Mewar. Kachhwahas were the only exception.)

From Vanguard to rear:

  • 85 Arab commandos under the vicious Arab general Sayyid Hashim al Barhai.
  • Then, Kacchavaha Hindu horsemen led by Rao Jagannath + horsemen of Mohammedan Mongols under Baqshi Ali Asaf Khan, the Khwaja of Kazvin in Persia.
  • Then the Iltmish brigade under the cousin of Man Singh, Madhav Singh with the second Kacchavaha corps. The center was under Man Singh with the third Kacchavaha force.
  • 3 brigades of the left wing:
    • Tajiks under Mullah Ghazi Khan, the veteran Jihadist from Tajikistan.
    • The traitor Rao Lonakarna leading a force of Kacchavahas from the Sambhar lake.
    • The Shaikhzada division formed by the prolific clansmen of Sufi Shaikh Salim Chishti.
  • The right-wing was formed by the vicious Arab clansmen of Sayyid Hashim al Barhai.
  • The rear-guard was formed by the brigade of Mihtar Khan and his Central Asian Kazakh warriors.

pratApasiMha’s side:

  • frontline charging force under Ramdas Rathod, the valiant son of Jaimal who died defending Chittor. Supported by Bhim Singh, the Rao Chundavat, and Hakim Khan Sur with his fellow Pathans who stayed true to his pledge despite being enticed for jihAd (Afghans having been deposed by bAbur’s invasion).
  • Pratap in the center with his elite rAjaputras.
  • 2 brigades of the right wing
    • Ram Singh Tanwar the king of Gwalior
    • vaishya division under the valiant 3 sons and the brother Tarachand of the rich businessman Bahman (aka bhAmA) Shah
  • Left wing - Jhala clan of the Rajputs under Mana
  • Reserve
    • brahmin brigade led by Pratap‚Äôs purohita Jagannatha
    • brigade formed by the Mehta businessmen and the Charanas
    • Bhil archers under the Bhil chieftain Panja

Thus, all sections of the Hindu society were represented in the struggle to defend against Islamist gAzi-s.

Outcome: Fierce battle. mahArANA pratAp wounded, as was his horse chetak. He escaped to fight on from the forests. By 1579, pratApasiMha would recover much of the western part of his kingdom. Chittor and the rest of eastern Mewar continued to remain under Mughal control.

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags:

2021-06-29

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-20,‡§ï‡•Å‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§É-‡§∂‡§§‡§≠‡§ø‡§∑‡§ï‡•çüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-03-15üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-09ü™êüåû‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-08, Islamic: 1442-11-19 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah

  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§™‡§û‡•ç‡§ö‡§Æ‡•Ä‚ñ∫13:23; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§∑‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡•Ä‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§∂‡§§‡§≠‡§ø‡§∑‡§ï‡•ç‚ñ∫25:00*; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§™‡§¶‡§æ‚ñ∫ (‡§ï‡•Å‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫12:16; ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§§‡•à‡§§‡§ø‡§≤‡§É‚ñ∫13:23; ‡§ó‡§∞‡§É‚ñ∫25:15*; ‡§µ‡§£‡§ø‡§ú‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡§ü‡§É
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (145.01¬∞ ‚Üí 146.02¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (19.91¬∞ ‚Üí 20.34¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (125.43¬∞ ‚Üí 126.41¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-33.28¬∞ ‚Üí -32.94¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-24.72¬∞ ‚Üí -24.98¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:49-12:12üåûÔ∏è-18:35üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî10:01; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî22:40
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:49-07:25; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:00-10:36; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:12-13:48; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:23-16:59; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:35-19:59
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:49-06:40; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:40-07:31; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:13-10:04; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:46-12:37; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:20-15:11; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:53-17:44; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:44-18:35
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:19-05:04; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:05-01:19
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî15:23-16:59; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî09:00-10:36; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî12:12-13:48
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§â‡§¶‡•Ä‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫10:55); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•Ä‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡•ã‡§ú‡•Ä-‡§∂‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§É #‡•©‡•™‡•´
‡§®‡•á‡§§‡•ã‡§ú‡•Ä-‡§∂‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§É #‡•©‡•™‡•´

Event occured on 1676-06-29 (gregorian). Julian date was converted to Gregorian in this reckoning. (AShADha k4) - Netaji pAlkar ghar-vApasI.

After Shivaji’s escape from Agra, Aurangzeb, as a revenge, ordered Jai Singh to arrest Netaji Palkar. Netaji Palkar was then converted to Islam. His wives were thereafter brought to Delhi and also converted for him to remarry them in the Islamic way. Taking up the name of Muhammed Kuli Khan, Netaji Palkar was appointed as garrison commander of the Kandahar fort in Afghanistan. He tried to escape but was traced and trapped at Lahore. Thereafter on the battlefields of Kandhar and Kabul, he fought for the Mughals against rebel Pathans. Thus he gained the good faith of Aurangzeb and was sent to the Deccan along with Commander Diler Khan to conquer Shivaji’s territory. Here, after 8 years, Netaji joined Shivaji’s troops and went to Raigad. He peformed the prAyashchitta-s and made hindu again.

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags:

2021-06-30

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-21,‡§ï‡•Å‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§É-‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§™‡§¶‡§æüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-03-16üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-10ü™êüåû‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-09, Islamic: 1442-11-20 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§∑‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡•Ä‚ñ∫13:18; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§∏‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•Ä‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§™‡§¶‡§æ‚ñ∫26:01*; ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§™‡§¶‡§æ‚ñ∫ (‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§®‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‚ñ∫11:10; ‡§∏‡•å‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§Ø‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§µ‡§£‡§ø‡§ú‡§É‚ñ∫13:18; ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫25:34*; ‡§¨‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ç‡§π‡§É
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (146.02¬∞ ‚Üí 147.03¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-24.98¬∞ ‚Üí -25.23¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (126.41¬∞ ‚Üí 127.40¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-32.94¬∞ ‚Üí -32.61¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (20.34¬∞ ‚Üí 20.70¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:49-12:12üåûÔ∏è-18:35üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî10:52; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî23:19
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:49-07:25; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:01-10:36; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:12-13:48; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:24-16:59; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:35-19:59
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:49-06:40; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:40-07:31; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:13-10:04; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:47-12:38; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:20-15:11; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:53-17:44; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:44-18:35
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:19-05:04; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:05-01:20
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî12:12-13:48; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî07:25-09:01; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî10:36-12:12
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§â‡§¶‡•Ä‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫12:38); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•Ä‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç

2021-07

2021-07-01

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-22,‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§®‡§É-‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§™‡§¶‡§æüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-03-17üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-11ü™êüåû‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-10, Islamic: 1442-11-21 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§∏‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•Ä‚ñ∫14:02; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§Ö‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ‡•Ä‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§™‡§¶‡§æ‚ñ∫27:47*; ‡§∞‡•á‡§µ‡§§‡•Ä‚ñ∫ (‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§®‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§∏‡•å‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§Ø‡§É‚ñ∫10:42; ‡§∂‡•ã‡§≠‡§®‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§¨‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫14:02; ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫26:40*; ‡§ï‡•å‡§≤‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ç‡§π‡§É
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (147.03¬∞ ‚Üí 148.04¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-32.61¬∞ ‚Üí -32.28¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (127.40¬∞ ‚Üí 128.38¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-25.23¬∞ ‚Üí -25.49¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (20.70¬∞ ‚Üí 20.97¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:49-12:12üåûÔ∏è-18:35üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî11:40; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî23:58
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:49-07:25; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:01-10:37; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:12-13:48; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:24-16:59; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:35-19:59
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:49-06:41; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:41-07:32; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:14-10:05; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:47-12:38; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:20-15:11; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:53-17:44; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:44-18:35
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:20-05:05; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:05-01:20
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî13:48-15:24; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî05:49-07:25; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî09:01-10:37
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫14:20); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§§‡•à‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§ö‡•á‡§§‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡§ø‡§µ‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§§‡§É #‡•™‡•™‡•´, ‡§™‡§û‡•ç‡§ö-‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ-‡§™‡•Ç‡§ú‡§æ (‡§Ö‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ‡•Ä), ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§Ü‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§Ø‡§Ç ‡§π‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§ø #‡•ß‡•ß‡•®
‡§ö‡•á‡§§‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡§ø‡§µ‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§§‡§É #‡•™‡•™‡•´

Event occured on 1576-07-01 (gregorian). Julian date was converted to Gregorian in this reckoning. After the fierce battle at haldIghATI, mahArANA pratAp wounded, as was his heroic horse chetak. Chetak succumbed on this day.

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags:
‡§Æ‡§¶‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§Ü‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§Ø‡§Ç ‡§π‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§ø #‡•ß‡•ß‡•®

Event occured on 1909-07-01 (gregorian). Madanlal Dhingra killed Curzon Wyllie, a distinguished British former soldier and head of secret police who were trying to get info about sAvarkar. Dhingra fired five shots right at his face, four of which hit their target.

Dhingra was tried in the Old Bailey on 23 July. He represented himself during his trial but did not recognize the legitimacy of the court. He said: “I hold the English people responsible for the murder of 80 millions of Indian people in the last fifty years, and they are also responsible for taking away ¬£100,000,000 every year from India to this country. … Just as the Germans have no right to occupy this country, so the English people have no right to occupy India, and it is perfectly justifiable on our part to kill the Englishman who is polluting our sacred land.” His supposed last words: “The only lesson required in India at present is to learn how to die, and the only way to teach it is by dying ourselves. My only prayer to God is that I may be re-born of the same mother and I may re-die in the same sacred cause till the cause is successful. Vande Mataram! "

Dhingra was heavily inspired by VD sAvarkar, but was disowned for his political activities by his father Gitta Mall, who was the Chief Medical Officer in Amritsar, who went so far as to publish his decision in newspaper advertisements. After his execution, Dhingra’s body was denied Hindu rites and buried. They refused to turn over the body to Savarkar. Bhagat Singh and Chandrasekhar Azad were inspired by him.

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags:
‡§™‡§û‡•ç‡§ö-‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ-‡§™‡•Ç‡§ú‡§æ (‡§Ö‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ‡•Ä)

Observed on K·πõ·π£·πáa-A·π£·π≠amƒ´ tithi of every (lunar) month (ƒÄ≈õvina·∏•/paraviddha).

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags: Pancha Parva

2021-07-02

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-23,‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§®‡§É-‡§∞‡•á‡§µ‡§§‡•Äüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-03-18üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-12ü™êüåû‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-11, Islamic: 1442-11-22 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§Ö‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ‡•Ä‚ñ∫15:29; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§®‡§µ‡§Æ‡•Ä‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§∞‡•á‡§µ‡§§‡•Ä‚ñ∫ (‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§®‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§∂‡•ã‡§≠‡§®‡§É‚ñ∫10:49; ‡§Ö‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡§£‡•ç‡§°‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•å‡§≤‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫15:29; ‡§§‡•à‡§§‡§ø‡§≤‡§É‚ñ∫28:26*; ‡§ó‡§∞‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ç‡§π‡§É
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (148.04¬∞ ‚Üí 149.05¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (20.97¬∞ ‚Üí 21.17¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (128.38¬∞ ‚Üí 129.38¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-25.49¬∞ ‚Üí -25.75¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-32.28¬∞ ‚Üí -31.94¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:50-12:12üåûÔ∏è-18:35üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî12:28; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî00:35(+1)
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:50-07:25; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:01-10:37; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:12-13:48; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:24-17:00; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:35-20:00
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:50-06:41; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:41-07:32; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:14-10:05; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:47-12:38; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:20-15:11; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:53-17:44; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:44-18:35
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:20-05:05; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:05-01:20
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî10:37-12:12; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî15:24-17:00; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî07:25-09:01
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫10:56); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§ó‡•Å‡§°‡§Æ‡•ç

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§è‡§Ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§©‡•ç ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§©‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç (‡•®‡•Æ) ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§™‡•Ç‡§ú‡•à, ‡§§‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ‡•Ä, ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§≤‡•ã‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ‡•Ä, ‡§≠‡•É‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•á‡§µ‡§§‡•Ä-‡§™‡•Å‡§£‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ‡•Ä, ‡§∂‡•Ä‡§§‡§≤‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ‡•Ä
‡§è‡§Ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§©‡•ç ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§©‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç (‡•®‡•Æ) ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§™‡•Ç‡§ú‡•à

Observed on Revatƒ´ nakshatra of Mithunam (sidereal solar) month (PrƒÅta·∏•/paraviddha).

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags: NayanarGurupujai
‡§≠‡•É‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•á‡§µ‡§§‡•Ä-‡§™‡•Å‡§£‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É

When Revati nakshatra falls on a Friday, it is a special pu·πáyakƒÅla·∏•. When Rohini nakshatra falls on a Saturday, it is a special pu·πáyakƒÅla·∏•. In the cyclic rotation of time, along with the bad combinations of grahas and nakshatras that indicate the probability of upcoming difficulties, good combinations that grant benefits in multiples also arise. Among such good combinations are the Amrita Siddhi yogas of certain weekdays and nakshatras. They are Sunday-Hasta, Monday-Mrigashirsha, Tuesday-Ashvini, Wednesday-Anuradha, Thursday-Pushya, Friday-Revati, Saturday-Rohini. Good deeds performed on such yogas become especially strong in protecting and nourishing us. For instance, in Devi Atharvashirsha, it is said bhaumƒÅ≈õvinyƒÅ·πÉ mahƒÅd√™vƒ´-sannidhau japtvƒÅ mahƒÅm·πõtyu·πÉ tarati, that is, one can cross even mahƒÅm·πõtyu by doing parayanam when Tuesday and Ashvini join.

‡§Ü‡§¶‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§π‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§™‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§®‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ ‡§∂‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ã‡§π‡§ø‡§£‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•§
‡§∏‡•ã‡§Æ‡•á ‡§ö ‡§∏‡•å‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•É‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•á‡§µ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ö ‡§≠‡•å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§Æ‡•É‡§§‡§∏‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡§É‡••

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags: RareDays Combinations AmritaSiddhiYogaDays
‡§§‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ‡•Ä

Observed on K·πõ·π£·πáa-A·π£·π≠amƒ´ tithi of Jyai·π£·π≠ha·∏• (lunar) month (S≈´ryodaya·∏•/puurvaviddha). Start of one year vratam of monthly shiva pooja as per chaturvaga chintamani.

2021-07-03

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-24,‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§®‡§É-‡§∞‡•á‡§µ‡§§‡•Äüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-03-19üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-13ü™êüåû‡§∂‡§®‡§ø‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-12, Islamic: 1442-11-23 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§®‡§µ‡§Æ‡•Ä‚ñ∫17:30; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§¶‡§∂‡§Æ‡•Ä‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§∞‡•á‡§µ‡§§‡•Ä‚ñ∫06:11; ‡§Ö‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§®‡•Ä‚ñ∫ (‡§Æ‡•á‡§∑‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§Ö‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡§£‡•ç‡§°‡§É‚ñ∫11:24; ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡§∞‡§É‚ñ∫17:30; ‡§µ‡§£‡§ø‡§ú‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§ï‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-25.75¬∞ ‚Üí -26.01¬∞), ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (149.05¬∞ ‚Üí 150.06¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (21.17¬∞ ‚Üí 21.29¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (129.38¬∞ ‚Üí 130.37¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-31.94¬∞ ‚Üí -31.61¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:50-12:13üåûÔ∏è-18:35üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî13:15; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî01:14(+1)
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:50-07:26; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:01-10:37; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:13-13:48; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:24-17:00; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:35-20:00
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:50-06:41; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:41-07:32; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:14-10:05; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:47-12:38; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:20-15:11; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:53-17:44; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:44-18:35
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:20-05:05; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:05-01:20
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî09:01-10:37; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî13:48-15:24; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî05:50-07:26
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫09:14); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§¶‡§ß‡§ø

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó‡§æ-‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§Æ‡§®‡•ã‡§ú-‡§™‡§æ‡§£‡•ç‡§°‡•á‡§Ø-‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡§ó‡§§‡§ø‡§É #‡•®‡•®, ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ò‡•ç‡§∞‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§£‡§æ‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§É #‡•®‡•®
‡§¶‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó‡§æ-‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç

Observed on K·πõ·π£·πáa-Navamƒ´ tithi of Jyai·π£·π≠ha·∏• (lunar) month (S≈´ryodaya·∏•/puurvaviddha).

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags: SpecialPuja
‡§Æ‡§®‡•ã‡§ú-‡§™‡§æ‡§£‡•ç‡§°‡•á‡§Ø-‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡§ó‡§§‡§ø‡§É #‡•®‡•®

Event occured on 1999-07-03 (gregorian). Lieutenant Manoj Kumar Pandey, a young officer of the 1/11 Gorkha Rifles, died conquering Jubar Top from pAkistAni jihAdists on this day.

On the night of 2/3 July 1999, ‘B’ Company of 1/11 Gorkha Rifles approached Jubar top along a narrow ridge. He surged ahead of his troops and charged at the enemy with a full-throated battle cry (‡§ú‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä! ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã ‡§ó‡§æ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä!) through a hail of bullets. Fearlessly assaulting the first enemy position, he killed two enemy personnel and destroyed the second position by killing two more. Although wounded in the shoulder and leg, he pressed on his solitary charge with grim determination, until he closed in on the first bunker. He continued to lead the assault on the fourth position urging his men and destroyed the same with a grenade, even as he got a fatal Medium Machine Gun burst on his forehead.

Entries in Pandey’s personal diary:

  • ‘If death strikes before I prove my blood, I promise (swear), I will kill death!’
  • ‘Some goals are so worthy, it’s glorious even to fail!’
Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags:
‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ò‡•ç‡§∞‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§£‡§æ‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§É #‡•®‡•®

Event occured on 1999-07-03 (gregorian). The final assault on Tiger Hill began on 3 July at 17:15 during Kargil war/ operation vijay.

After artillery pounding for 13 hours, 2 Naga advanced on the right and 8 Sikh advanced on the left. They used unexpected, and therefore difficult, avenues of approach. ghAtak commandoes of 18 Grenadiers advanced up the rear. Just as they reached the top, they were spotted and fired upon. In the early morning hours of 4th July, Yogendra yAdav despite being hit by multiple bullets, climbed up, crawled to the first bunker, downed 4 pAki solidiers with a grenade, charged a second bunker with two others. Hit by 21 bullets, he was to receive PVC later. Maj. Ravinder Singh of 8 Sikh with 200 soldiers launched a daring attack to relieve them.

Aftermath- Most of the Sikh soldiers attacked without cold weather gear, and many of the wounded died from exposure. 18 Grenadiers seized the 16,700-foot (5,062 m) Tiger Hill Top on the morning of 8 July.

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags:

2021-07-04

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-25,‡§Æ‡•á‡§∑‡§É-‡§Ö‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§®‡•Äüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-03-20üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-14ü™êüåû‡§≠‡§æ‡§®‡•Å‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-13, Islamic: 1442-11-24 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§¶‡§∂‡§Æ‡•Ä‚ñ∫19:56; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§è‡§ï‡§æ‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ö‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§®‡•Ä‚ñ∫09:03; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§≠‡§∞‡§£‡•Ä‚ñ∫ (‡§Æ‡•á‡§∑‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‚ñ∫12:19; ‡§ß‡•É‡§§‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§µ‡§£‡§ø‡§ú‡§É‚ñ∫06:41; ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫19:56; ‡§¨‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§ï‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (150.06¬∞ ‚Üí 151.08¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-26.01¬∞ ‚Üí -26.26¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-31.61¬∞ ‚Üí -31.28¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (21.29¬∞ ‚Üí 21.34¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (130.37¬∞ ‚Üí 131.37¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:50-12:13üåûÔ∏è-18:35üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî14:02; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî01:54(+1)
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:50-07:26; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:02-10:37; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:13-13:48; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:24-17:00; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:35-20:00
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:50-06:41; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:41-07:32; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:14-10:05; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:47-12:38; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:20-15:11; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:53-17:44; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:44-18:35
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:20-05:05; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:05-01:20
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî17:00-18:35; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî12:13-13:48; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî15:24-17:00
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫10:56); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§ó‡•Å‡§°‡§Æ‡•ç

2021-07-05

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-26,‡§Æ‡•á‡§∑‡§É-‡§Ö‡§™‡§≠‡§∞‡§£‡•Äüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-03-21üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-15ü™êüåû‡§∏‡•ã‡§Æ‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-14, Islamic: 1442-11-25 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§è‡§ï‡§æ‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä‚ñ∫22:30; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ö‡§™‡§≠‡§∞‡§£‡•Ä‚ñ∫12:10; ‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‚ñ∫ (‡§µ‡•É‡§∑‡§≠‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫28:54*; ‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ß‡•É‡§§‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫13:25; ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§¨‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫09:13; ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫22:30; ‡§ï‡•å‡§≤‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§§‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (151.08¬∞ ‚Üí 152.09¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (21.34¬∞ ‚Üí 21.32¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (131.37¬∞ ‚Üí 132.37¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-26.26¬∞ ‚Üí -26.52¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-31.28¬∞ ‚Üí -30.94¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:51-12:13üåûÔ∏è-18:35üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî14:51; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî02:36(+1)
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:51-07:26; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:02-10:37; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:13-13:49; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:24-17:00; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:35-20:00
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:51-06:42; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:42-07:33; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:15-10:06; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:48-12:38; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:20-15:11; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:53-17:44; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:44-18:35
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:21-05:06; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:06-01:21
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî07:26-09:02; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî10:37-12:13; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî13:49-15:24
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫09:15); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§¶‡§ß‡§ø

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ-‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ-‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡•Ä-‡§è‡§ï‡§æ‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä
‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ-‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç

Observed on K·πõttikƒÅ nakshatra of every (sidereal solar) month (S≈´ryƒÅstamaya·∏•/puurvaviddha). k·πõttikƒÅ-vratam for Lord Subrahmanya. Observe fast for the entire day, and obtain blessings of all the k·πõttikƒÅ-striya·∏• who raised skanda after His birth.

  • Edit config file
  • Tags: SpecialVratam
‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ-‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡•Ä-‡§è‡§ï‡§æ‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä

The Krishna-paksha Ekadashi of jyai·π£·π≠ha month is known as yoginƒ´-ekƒÅda≈õƒ´.

  • Tags: MonthlyVratam EkadashiVratam

2021-07-06

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-27,‡§µ‡•É‡§∑‡§≠‡§É-‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ï‡§æüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É-03-22üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-16ü™êüåû‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-15, Islamic: 1442-11-26 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä‚ñ∫25:02*; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‚ñ∫15:18; ‡§∞‡•ã‡§π‡§ø‡§£‡•Ä‚ñ∫ (‡§µ‡•É‡§∑‡§≠‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§É‚ñ∫14:31; ‡§ó‡§£‡•ç‡§°‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•å‡§≤‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫11:48; ‡§§‡•à‡§§‡§ø‡§≤‡§É‚ñ∫25:02*; ‡§ó‡§∞‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§§‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (152.09¬∞ ‚Üí 153.11¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (21.32¬∞ ‚Üí 21.22¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (132.37¬∞ ‚Üí 133.37¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-30.94¬∞ ‚Üí -30.61¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-26.52¬∞ ‚Üí -26.78¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:51-12:13üåûÔ∏è-18:35üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî15:40; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî03:20(+1)
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:51-07:26; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:02-10:38; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:13-13:49; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:24-17:00; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:35-20:00
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:51-06:42; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:42-07:33; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:15-10:06; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:48-12:39; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:21-15:12; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:54-17:45; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:45-18:35
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:21-05:06; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:06-01:21
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî15:24-17:00; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî09:02-10:38; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî12:13-13:49
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§â‡§¶‡•Ä‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫10:57); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•Ä‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§ï‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ-‡§ú‡§Ø‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä, ‡§ö‡§ø‡§¶‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞‡•á ‡§ß‡•ç‡§µ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§π‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç/‡§™‡§û‡•ç‡§ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§∞‡§•‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§É, ‡§™‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§®‡•Ä-‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä, ‡§π‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡§∞‡§É
‡§ö‡§ø‡§¶‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞‡•á ‡§ß‡•ç‡§µ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§π‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç/‡§™‡§û‡•ç‡§ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§∞‡§•‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§É

  • Edit config file
  • Tags: TamilnaduTempleFestivals
‡§π‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡§∞‡§É
  • ‚Üí05:09

The first quarter of dvƒÅda≈õƒ´ tithi is not suitable for breaking fast (pƒÅra·πáa), and is known as harivƒÅsara·∏•. Break fast once harivƒÅsara·∏• is over.

‡§Ö‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§ø‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§ß‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•á‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§∂‡§µ‡•§
‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ñ‡•ã ‡§®‡§æ‡§• ‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§®‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡•ã ‡§≠‡§µ‡••
‡§µ‡•à‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§®‡§æ‡§•‡§¶‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø‡•á ‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§£‡•ç‡§°‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§£‡•Å‡§ß‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á—
‡§Ö‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§§‡•Å‡§≤‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§§‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§¶‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‡•§
‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ö‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Å‡§§‡§´‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç ‡§Ü‡§ó‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•á‡§µ ‡§µ‡§æ‡•§
‡§Ü‡§Æ‡§≤‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§É ‡§´‡§≤‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§ø ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡§£‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∂‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§§‡§ø‡••

  • Edit config file
  • Tags: MonthlyVratam EkadashiVratam
‡§ï‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ-‡§ú‡§Ø‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä

Observed on K·πõ·π£·πáa-DvƒÅda≈õƒ´ tithi of Jyai·π£·π≠ha·∏• (lunar) month (SƒÅyƒÅhna·∏•/puurvaviddha). Danam of Brahma puranam

‡§™‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§®‡•Ä-‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä

Dvadashi tithi, which is followed by an amƒÅvƒÅsyƒÅ or paur·πáamƒÅsƒ´ that touches two consecutive days at sunrise.

2021-07-07

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-28,‡§µ‡•É‡§∑‡§≠‡§É-‡§∞‡•ã‡§π‡§ø‡§£‡•Äüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É-03-23üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-17ü™êüåû‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-16, Islamic: 1442-11-27 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä‚ñ∫27:20*; ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§ö‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§∞‡•ã‡§π‡§ø‡§£‡•Ä‚ñ∫18:16; ‡§Æ‡•É‡§ó‡§∂‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡•ç‚ñ∫ (‡§µ‡•É‡§∑‡§≠‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ó‡§£‡•ç‡§°‡§É‚ñ∫15:30; ‡§µ‡•É‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡§∞‡§É‚ñ∫14:14; ‡§µ‡§£‡§ø‡§ú‡§É‚ñ∫27:20*; ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§§‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-26.78¬∞ ‚Üí -27.03¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (21.22¬∞ ‚Üí 21.05¬∞), ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (153.11¬∞ ‚Üí 154.12¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-30.61¬∞ ‚Üí -30.28¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (133.37¬∞ ‚Üí 134.38¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:51-12:13üåûÔ∏è-18:36üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî16:30; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî04:08(+1)
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:51-07:27; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:02-10:38; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:13-13:49; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:24-17:00; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:36-20:00
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:51-06:42; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:42-07:33; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:15-10:06; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:48-12:39; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:21-15:12; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:54-17:45; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:45-18:36
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:21-05:06; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:06-01:21
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî12:13-13:49; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî07:27-09:02; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî10:38-12:13
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§â‡§¶‡•Ä‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫12:39); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•Ä‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§ö‡§ø‡§¶‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞‡•á ‡§∞‡§ú‡§§ ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡•ã‡§∑-‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ-‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡§ó‡§§‡§ø‡§É #‡•®‡•®
‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ-‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ-‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡§ó‡§§‡§ø‡§É #‡•®‡•®

Event occured on 1999-07-07 (gregorian). Captain Vikram Batra of 13th battalion, Jammu and Kashmir Rifles, called Shershah by pAkistani jihAdist enemies for his prior bravery, died capturing Point 4875 on this day.

Area Flat Top, an adjacent peak and part of enemy defences on Point 4875 was being held by Capt. N.A. Nagappa till he was rendered unconscious by a shell. Vikram Batra, though still recovering from earlier injuries, insisted on going up to help. Seeing Batra’s determination to save Peak 4875 and the honour of his battalion, several of his company’s soldiers volunteered to accompany him even before any official orders had been issued. Just before leaving, Batra along with the 25 men of D Coy who were to accompany him, prayed at the Durga Mata temple.

His company was tasked to clear a narrow feature with sharp cuttings on either side and heavily fortified enemy defences that covered the only approach to it. For speedy operation, Captain Batra assaulted the enemy position along a narrow ridge and engaged the enemy in a fierce hand ‚Äìto-hand fight and killed five enemy soldiers at point blank range. Despite sustaining grave injuries, he crawled towards the enemy and hurled grenades clearing the position. Though it was pitch dark, on a foggy snowy night with a near vertical climb, Batra downed 3 machine gun positions. By the time they reached the top, it was daylight. Not finding an alternate route to reach Capt Nagappa, they decided to make a direct daylight frontal assault. Under heavy fire from enemy machine guns and grenade launchers, the captain shouted ‘Durga mata ki jai’, and charged the sangar firing incessantly from his AK-47. Despite injury, he managed to breach it, punch a pAki soldier on the nose before bayoneting him (and downing another). They further captured a machine gun nest, killing 4 pAkis. Realising that one of his men was shot, Batra decided to evacuate him - positioning himself in the front saying ‘You have a family and children to go back to, I’m not even married.’. Then he was fatally shot by enemy sniper, and an RPG splinter caught him.

Earlier victory: During ‚ÄòOperation Vijay‚Äô, on 20 June 1999, Captain Vikram Batra, Commander Delta Company was tasked to attack Point 5140 of Dras. Leading from the front, he in a daredevil assault, pounced on the enemy and killed four of them in a hand-to hand fight. He radioed the predetermined code: ‘Yeh Dil Mange More!’. Batra was promoted to the rank of captain, and congradulated by the Army chief.

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags:

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags: TamilnaduTempleFestivals
‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡•ã‡§∑-‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç
  • 18:36‚Üí19:21

Pradosha Vratam. Fast during the day and perform ≈õivap≈´jƒÅ in Pradosha Kala.

‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡•ã‡§∑‡•á ‡§∂‡§ø‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡•Å ‡§Ø‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§§‡§æ‡§É‡•§
‡§® ‡§≠‡§µ‡•á‡§§‡•ç ‡§§‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§®‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§∂‡§§‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡§ø‡••

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags: MonthlyVratam PradoshaVratam

2021-07-08

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-29,‡§µ‡•É‡§∑‡§≠‡§É-‡§Æ‡•É‡§ó‡§∂‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡•çüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É-03-24üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-18ü™êüåû‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-17, Islamic: 1442-11-28 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§£-‡§ö‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä‚ñ∫29:16*; ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Æ‡•É‡§ó‡§∂‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡•ç‚ñ∫20:56; ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫ (‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§µ‡•É‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫16:15; ‡§ß‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫16:21; ‡§∂‡§ï‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§É‚ñ∫29:16*; ‡§ö‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§µ‡•É‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§ï‡§É
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (154.12¬∞ ‚Üí 155.14¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-27.03¬∞ ‚Üí -27.29¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (134.38¬∞ ‚Üí 135.39¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (21.05¬∞ ‚Üí 20.81¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-30.28¬∞ ‚Üí -29.95¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:51-12:13üåûÔ∏è-18:36üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî17:21; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî04:58(+1)
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:51-07:27; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:02-10:38; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:13-13:49; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:25-17:00; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:36-20:00
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:51-06:42; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:42-07:33; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:15-10:06; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:48-12:39; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:21-15:12; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:54-17:45; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:45-18:36
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:21-05:06; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:06-01:21
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî13:49-15:25; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî05:51-07:27; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî09:02-10:38
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫14:21); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§§‡•à‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§ö‡§ø‡§¶‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£-‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§™‡§û‡•ç‡§ö-‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ-‡§™‡•Ç‡§ú‡§æ (‡§ö‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡§∂‡•Ä), ‡§¨‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§É #‡•™‡•≠‡•™, ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∏‡§∂‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É
‡§¨‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§É #‡•™‡•≠‡•™

Event occured on 1547-07-08 (gregorian). Julian date was converted to Gregorian in this reckoning. Event occured on 1547-07-08 (gregorian). Julian date was converted to Gregorian in this reckoning. Bhama Shah, a vaishya, was a great general, adviser, minister of Mewar, who was later promoted to post of Prime Minister of Mewar by Maharana Pratap, to whom he served as close aide and confidante. He along with his younger brother Tarachand fought in several battles for Mewar.

After Maharana Pratap was defeated by Akbar in the Battle of Haldighati, had no funds at all to carry on the fight, and his family was close to starvation. At this point, Bhama shah and his brother Tarachand, presented their wealth to maharana Pratap, who was overwhelmed.

  • Tags:

  • Edit config file
  • Tags: TamilnaduTempleFestivals
‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∏‡§∂‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É

Observed on K·πõ·π£·πáa-Caturda≈õƒ´ tithi of every (lunar) month (Ni≈õƒ´tha·∏•/paraviddha). Monthly Shivaratri day.

Observed on K·πõ·π£·πáa-Caturda≈õƒ´ tithi of every (lunar) month (ƒÄ≈õvina·∏•/paraviddha).

2021-07-09

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-30,‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É-03-25üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-19ü™êüåû‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-18, Islamic: 1442-11-29 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‚ñ∫23:12; ‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É‚ñ∫ (‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§ß‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫16:41; ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ò‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ö‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‚ñ∫18:05; ‡§®‡§æ‡§ó‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§µ‡•É‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§ï‡§É
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (155.14¬∞ ‚Üí 156.16¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (135.39¬∞ ‚Üí 136.40¬∞), ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (20.81¬∞ ‚Üí 20.50¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-27.29¬∞ ‚Üí -27.54¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-29.95¬∞ ‚Üí -29.61¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:52-12:14üåûÔ∏è-18:36üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî18:11; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:50(+1)
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:52-07:27; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:03-10:38; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:14-13:49; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:25-17:00; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:36-20:00
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:52-06:43; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:43-07:34; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:15-10:06; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:48-12:39; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:21-15:12; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:54-17:45; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:45-18:36
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:22-05:07; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:06-01:21
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî10:38-12:14; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî15:25-17:00; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî07:27-09:03
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫10:57); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§ó‡•Å‡§°‡§Æ‡•ç

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§ö‡§ø‡§¶‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞‡•á ‡§∞‡§ú‡§§ ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§™‡§û‡•ç‡§ö-‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ-‡§™‡•Ç‡§ú‡§æ (‡§Ö‡§Æ‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ), ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§£‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ó‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ø-‡§™‡•Ç‡§ú‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ-‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†-‡§Ö‡§Æ‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ (‡§Ö‡§≤‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äì‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ)
‡§≠‡•ã‡§ó‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ø-‡§™‡•Ç‡§ú‡§æ

Observed on AmƒÅvƒÅsyƒÅ tithi of Jyai·π£·π≠ha·∏• (lunar) month (S≈´ryodaya·∏•/puurvaviddha).

‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§£‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ç

pƒÅrva·πáavratam on the eve of dar≈õa-sthƒÅlƒ´pƒÅka·∏•.

‡§ó‡•É‡§π‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç

‡§™‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§É, ‡§™‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§¶‡§Ø‡•ã ‡§Ω‡§≠‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§É‡•§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§û‡•ç‡§ö - ‘‡§Ö‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£ ‡§è‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡•Å‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•å‡§™‡§µ‡§∏‡§•‡§ø‡§ï‡§Ç ‡§¶‡§Æ‡•ç‡§™‡§§‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Å‡§û‡•ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§¶‡•ç ‡§è‡§®‡§Ø‡•ã‡§É ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç- ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§∂‡§≤‡•á‡§®’‡•§

‘‡§Ö‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡•§ ‡§∏‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§¶‡§ø‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡•§ ‡§Ö‡§ß ‡§è‡§µ‡•à‡§§‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§Ø‡•Ä‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ç‡•§ ‡§§‡•å ‡§ñ‡§≤‡•Å ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§®‡•ç-‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§µ‡•ç ‡§è‡§µ‡•à‡§§‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§π‡§∞‡•á‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ç ‡§á‡§§‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∏-‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§£ ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á‡§®‡§ö‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡•§ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§ó‡•Å‡§™‡•ç‡§∏‡•á‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡•ç ‡§è‡§µ‡§æ‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§É ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§É‡•§’

‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§≠‡§∞‡§£‡§æ‡§¶‡§Ø‡•ã ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§É ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§É‡•§

‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§Æ‡•ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§ø ‡§ï‡§ø‡§û‡•ç‡§ö‡§®‡•ç ‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç

“‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§£‡§ø ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§§‡§ø‡§≤‡§≠‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§â‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡•ã‡§≠‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§â‡§¶‡§ï‡§Æ‡•Å‡§™‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡•É‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡§∂‡§É ‡§∏‡§π‡§∏‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Ø‡•á‡§¶‡•ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡§∂‡•ã ‡§µ‡§æ” ‡§á‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ç ‡§Ü‡§™‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§ß‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•Å‡•§

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags:
‡§™‡§û‡•ç‡§ö-‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ-‡§™‡•Ç‡§ú‡§æ (‡§Ö‡§Æ‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ)

Observed on AmƒÅvƒÅsyƒÅ tithi of every (lunar) month (ƒÄ≈õvina·∏•/paraviddha).

Details
  • Edit config file
  • Tags: Pancha Parva
‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ-‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†-‡§Ö‡§Æ‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ (‡§Ö‡§≤‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äì‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ)

2021-07-10

‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É-03-30,‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Éüåõüåå‚ó¢‚ó£‡§Æ‡§ø‡§•‡•Å‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç-‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É-03-26üååüåû‚ó¢‚ó£‡§∂‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§É-04-20ü™êüåû‡§∂‡§®‡§ø‡§É

  • Indian civil date: 1943-04-19, Islamic: 1442-11-30 ·∏é≈´ al-Qa ødah
  • ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§É - ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§µ‡§É
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∏‡§ô‡•ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ üåõ- ‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 1943, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡§É 2078, ‡§ï‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•á 5122
  • ü™êüåû‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§¶‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∑‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ã‡§§‡•Å‡§É ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡•à‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§É

‡§ñ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§É

  • |üåû-üåõ|‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§É ‚Äî ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‚ñ∫06:46; ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§≤-‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§•‡§Æ‡§æ‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É‚ñ∫25:00*; ‡§™‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø‡§É‚ñ∫ (‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡§ü‡§É)
  • üååüåû‡§∏‡•å‡§∞-‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üåõ+üåû‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§É ‚Äî ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ò‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚ñ∫16:45; ‡§π‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§£‡§É‚ñ∫
  • ‡•®|üåõ-üåû|‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡§Æ‡•ç ‚Äî ‡§®‡§æ‡§ó‚ñ∫06:46; ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§ò‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚ñ∫19:20; ‡§¨‡§µ‡§É‚ñ∫
  • üååüåõ- ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ-‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§É‚Äî‡§ß‡§®‡•Å‡§É
  • üåû-ü™ê ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§¢‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§É - ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ß‡§É (20.50¬∞ ‚Üí 20.12¬∞), ‡§∂‡§®‡•à‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡§É (156.16¬∞ ‚Üí 157.18¬∞), ‡§Æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§É (-29.61¬∞ ‚Üí -29.28¬∞), ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§É (136.40¬∞ ‚Üí 137.42¬∞), ‡§∂‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§É (-27.54¬∞ ‚Üí -27.79¬∞)

‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®-‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§É

  • üåÖ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî05:52-12:14üåûÔ∏è-18:36üåá
  • üåõ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî18:59; ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§¶‡§Ø‡§É‚Äî—
  • üåû‚öù‡§≠‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É‚Äî05:52-07:27; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É‚Äî09:03-10:38; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî12:14-13:49; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É‚Äî15:25-17:00; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É‚Äî18:36-20:00
  • üåû‚öù‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§£-‡§Æ‡§§‡•á ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§É‚Äî ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞1‚Äî05:52-06:43; ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî06:43-07:34; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ô‡•ç‡§ó‡§µ‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî09:16-10:07; ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî11:48-12:39; ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§£‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî14:21-15:12; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞2‚Äî16:54-17:45; ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§®‡§É-‡§Æ‡•Å‡•∞3‚Äî17:45-18:36
  • üåû‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî04:22-05:07; ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§É‚Äî23:06-01:22
  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî09:03-10:38; ‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ò‡§£‡•ç‡§ü‡§É‚Äî13:49-15:25; ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§É‚Äî05:52-07:27
  • ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§≤‡§Æ‡•ç‚Äî‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç (‚ñ∫09:16); ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§É‚Äì‡§¶‡§ß‡§ø

‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§É

  • ‡§ï‡§æ‡§û‡•ç‡§ö‡•Ä ‡•®‡•´ ‡§ú‡§ó‡§¶‡•ç‡§ó‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä-‡§∏‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§¶‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡§ò‡§®‡•á‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡§®‡§æ #‡•ß‡•™‡•≠‡•™, ‡§ö‡§ø‡§¶‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞‡•á ‡§∞‡§ú‡§§ ‡§ã‡§∑‡§≠ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§É, ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§£-‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§µ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∂‡§É ‡§™‡•å‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§™‡§æ‡§ï‡§É
‡§ö‡§ø‡§¶‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞‡•á ‡§∞‡§ú‡§§ ‡§ã‡§∑‡§≠ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç
